name: Popo Team
overview: In 200X Earth, there is a lack of morality. People produce too much garbage everywhere in the world. Pollution in the environment has turned on the red alarm! Dr. Po Po Lung, who has been living in this world of pollution, is very upset seeing the mess on our planet. He decides to change and return our planet into a clean and beautiful world. He has spent three months inventing a machine, called the "Chi Chi Po", which can automatically track the dirty garbage in our world. He has trained and organized a "Po Po Team" to collect all of the garbage. Now Dr. Po Po Lung bring his "Chi Chi Po" with the "Po Po Team" along the way for his greatest project yet!
